name: Glitz Halter Top
description: A shimmering halter top with metallic fabric that catches the light. Featuring a plunging neckline and open back, this piece screams early 2000s glam with its sparkling finish, perfect for a night out.

name: CyberCrop Tee
description: A futuristic, form-fitting cropped tee with bold graphics and metallic accents. It features vibrant colors and bold text, capturing the tech-inspired aesthetic of the Y2K era.

name: Butterfly Baby Tee
description: A tight-fitting baby tee adorned with a large, colorful butterfly print. With short sleeves and a slightly cropped length, it embodies the playful and cute side of early 2000s fashion.

name: Rhinestone Tube Top
description: This strapless tube top features a sleek silhouette covered in sparkling rhinestones. It's stretchy and body-hugging, designed to make you the center of attention at any party.

name: Velvet Tankini
description: A luxurious velvet two-piece tank top with a fitted design. It blends the comfort of a tank top with the elegance of a party piece, perfect for layering or wearing alone.

name: Metallic Cowl Neck
description: A draped cowl neck top made from shiny, metallic fabric. It has a loose, cascading neckline that gives it a chic, slinky look, ideal for pairing with low-rise jeans or mini skirts.

name: Mesh Long Sleeve
description: A see-through, long-sleeved mesh top featuring bold prints like flames, stars, or abstract patterns. It’s a versatile piece that can be layered over a bralette or worn under graphic tees.

name: Graphic Y2K Tee
description: A nostalgic graphic tee with iconic early 2000s logos, catchphrases, or pop culture references. Slightly oversized with a vintage feel, this piece is perfect for embracing the throwback vibe.

name: Shimmer Tie-Front Cardigan
description: A brightly colored, thin-strapped camisole in neon shades like lime green, hot pink, or electric blue. It’s made from stretchy fabric with a glossy finish, embodying the boldness of Y2K fashion.

name: Neon Camisole
description: Classic low-rise denim with a fitted upper and exaggerated flared bottoms. Often adorned with distressed details or embroidered patches, these jeans are quintessential to Y2K style.

name: Low-Rise Flare Jeans
description: Baggy, lightweight pants with multiple oversized pockets, adjustable drawstrings, and a relaxed fit. These utilitarian pants offer a streetwear vibe, perfect for a casual Y2K look.

name: Cargo Parachute Pants
description: Capri-length pants featuring a bold checkerboard pattern in contrasting colors. The cropped fit and playful design make them a standout piece for any Y2K-inspired outfit.

name: Checkerboard Capris
description: Mid to low-rise jeans with a flattering bootcut silhouette, featuring rhinestone embellishments along the pockets and seams. The sparkling details add a glamorous touch to this classic denim style.

name: Bedazzled Bootcut Jeans
description: A draped cowl neck top made from shiny, metallic fabric. It has a loose, cascading neckline that gives it a chic, slinky look, ideal for pairing with low-rise jeans or mini skirts.

name: Vinyl Flared Pants
description: A see-through, long-sleeved mesh top featuring bold prints like flames, stars, or abstract patterns. It’s a versatile piece that can be layered over a bralette or worn under graphic tees.

name: Velour Track Pants
description: Soft and plush, these low-rise track pants are made from velour fabric. With a relaxed fit and often paired with a matching zip-up hoodie, they capture the cozy yet stylish Y2K athleisure trend.
